text: Sergius papa, Godes þeowa þeow, Aldhelme <abbode> <æt> Mealdumesbyrig & his æfterfylgendum.
& <þurh> <eow> <eowrum> arwyrðum mynstre æw fulre drohtnunge <munecum>, godes þeowum.
Þa þincg þe ðar synd tobrohte & togyfene for frigre are & æhte to libbenne, na for luðre gelæfednesse.
Ac for geornfulnesse wel to drohtnienne.
Þeowdomum hi sylfe þa munecas nædsyndrige gewissunge to þeowigienne.
Buton ælcum twyn beon hi generude fram bisceopum & Godes biggencgerum.
Þa ðe Godes butan alysede fram bende ælces mennissces domes eallicre his.
Fram ælcere gærsuman woruldlicra brucunga geworðene clæne & unmæne.
Eall swa hyra munuc behat & hyra <regol> him cyþ.
<../images/tbar.gif>hi Gode hi sylfe geæmtigean.
& his sylfes þeowdome beon atihte.
For þæs mycelan mægan þrymmes arwyrþnysse hi synd gefreode.
Na<../images/tbar.gif>an woruldlicra doma hefitemum byrþenum.
Ac eac swylce beon hi wyrþe þæs mæstan wyrþscipes for þære rihtre regules lufan.

Þanon eower eadmodnyss & eower æwfæstnyss us bitt<../images/tbar.gif>we scylon getrymman mid apostolicum sunderfreodomum<../images/tbar.gif>mynster<../images/tbar.gif>is Sancte Petre & Sancte Paule gehalgud.
On þam mæran gemynde gelogud æt Meldum,<../images/tbar.gif>is oþrum naman Maldumes buruh geclypud, gesett & aræred on Angelsexena scire.
& eac oþer mynster is aræred on þære ylcan scire.
Wiþ þa ea þeo is geclypud Fron.
On wyrþscipe þæs mæran fulluhteres Iohannis is.
Þis we doþ for ure ealdres lufe sancte Petres þa.
& ure alysend hælend Crist gemedemude be.
To gewriþenne & to unbindenne on heofenan.
Ðenunge & ciricean we eac brucaþ & Gode.
Gendum geendebyrdaþ & dihtaþ þeah þe we unwyrþe & ungelice synd.
Be þisum forespecenum cyricum we habbaþ.
Manegra soþra race gehyred þe to us.
Ðu him.
Foregleawlice & wislice wissudest & dihtest.
Þæs wel uþon eowre est fulre eadmodnysse, to eowrum fultume.
We mynegiaþ eow gebroþru & halsiaþ<../images/tbar.gif>ge beon on Godes lofu carfulle.
& on gebedum þurh wacule.
On forhæfednysse & on clænnysse fæsthafule & on clyfigende.
Cumliþnysse & manscipes wel dædum beon underþeodde.
Hyrsumnysse & Cristes eadmodnysse þurhwunian æfre lufigendras & eow eall abutan mid þære arfæstre soðre lufe anræde gastlicum bebodum & haligra yldrena regulum to þeowigenne.
& þæs apostolices geleafan rihtincge ungewemmedlice gehealdan.
Godum biggencgum simble to geæmtigean.
Manscipe gyfan be þearfendum & ælþeodigum.
Godes cyricena bisceopum & mæssepreostum arwyrðnysse gegearwian swa hi hit geearnian.
Gode æfre geæmtigean, gemedemunge & þearflicnysse lufian.
On sealmum & on gastlicum ymnum & on singalum gebedum, on eallum Godes bebodum eow gemænelice awreccan & beoþ hicgende æfre & þeonde fram beteran to beteran.
& huru on eornust<../images/tbar.gif>ge beon carfulle embe eowre saule þearfe.
& simble truwian on Godes fultum eow <sylfe> ungewemmede<../images/tbar.gif>clænnyss & sidefulnys eowres lichaman & saule ætforan Godes eagan.
<../images/tbar.gif>se inra mann<../images/tbar.gif>is seo saul sie mid mihte Godes gyfe & eac se uttra<../images/tbar.gif>is se <lichama> begyte lof goddre drohtnunge & Godes hlisan eornige.
We gedemaþ & gesettaþ mid andweardum apostolicum.
Sunderfreodomum beon to bewerigende <&>.
Þas fore sædan & arwyrþan mynstru forþi þe.
Nað & beon sceal ure bisceoplicre gyfe wel dæd þylcum Godes freondum þe hi þus healdaþ swa we gefyrn embe spæcon.

<../images/tbar.gif>hi under rihtum dome & bewerunge þas sylfan þe we þeowiað ures aldres þæs eadigan Petres apostoles & his haligan cyricean þære we dihtniað eallswa þin godnyss & þin æwfaestnyss us bæd<../images/tbar.gif>scel þurhwunian mid Godes fultume & mid Sancte Petres nu & on ecnysse.
Na hi næfre na gyrnan nanne oððe bisceopa oþþe sacerda.
Oþþe ænigra cyriclicre endebyrdnysse preost.

Na hi huru þinga na gesetten nanne bisceopstol innon hyra cyricean oððe furþon þær lætan þæne bisceop mæssan singan butan gyf he þyder cymð gelaþud of þam abbude & þære geferræddenne gyf hi neode habbað to halgigenne enigne mæsse preost oþþe diacon for mæssena neode &<../images/tbar.gif>buton ælcum tweon halgie buton ælcum scette under Godes dome swa swa ealle þincg to þam haligan regule belimpan.

Gyf<../images/tbar.gif>getimie<../images/tbar.gif>is eallum mannum gemære<../images/tbar.gif>se abbud gewite of þissum life & hit cume þærto<../images/tbar.gif>hi beon cyres wyrþe na awende man næfre of þære <halgan> gegaderunge gemænum geþeahte.
<../images/tbar.gif>þæne þe hi <ceosað> of Godes þeowum si<../images/tbar.gif>stedefæst<../images/tbar.gif>nan lyre oððe.
Acume on þa lare þære munuclicre drohtnunge.
Þincg forwyrþan for abbudleaste.
Se bisceop.
Ne awiste beo be ure apostolicre leafe & <ealdordome> <nime>.
Ræd þærto<../images/tbar.gif>þær abbud wyrþe.
Nu ge gebroðru.
Þincg synd þus gelogud.

Gyf ænig bisceop si oððe mæsse preost oþþe æniges gehadudes oþþe læwedes na si he na swa rice<../images/tbar.gif>se ne understande þas þincg to awendenne oþþe geþristlæcre to abreccenne þe her sind under Godes dome & Sanctus Petrus & uru eac gesette.

Wite he hine scyldigne ætforan godes gesihþe & fram ascyrudne fram gemænnysse þæs halwendes lichaman blodes ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes & gehleote eac þa genyþerunge is ðe Scarioth ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes belæwend geearnude.
Si he gedemed eall swa wæs Annanias & Zafira his wif fram Sancte Petre þæs apostol.
E & si he to bealue & to ecere yrmþe efre geteald & betæht, buton he hit er hæle & <bete>.
Si æfre lif & hæl & ece eadignyss þam þe þas ðincg gehealdan & þam þe hi beo to healdenne.
Handtacen Æþelredes Myrcena kyncges.
Handtacen Ines Wessexena cyncges.
Ic Ealdhelm brohte to Ine Wessexena kyncge & to Æþelræde Myrcena kyncge þas privilegia.
<../images/tbar.gif>sind syndrie freodomas þe se apostolica papa Sergius awrat to ðæra apostola mynstre Petres & Paules.
& hi geþwæredon & hi hit swa geendudon,<../images/tbar.gif>swa hweþer swa hit wære swa sibb swa twyrednys betweonan Saxan & Myrcenum.
<../images/tbar.gif>þæt mynster beo æfre on sibbe & þa þe <þær> <Gode> <ðeowiað>.
